title: East Village, Connecticut
text:
East Village is a <a href="census-designated%20place">census-designated place</a> (CDP) in the town of <a href="Monroe%2C%20Connecticut">Monroe</a>, <a href="Fairfield%20County%2C%20Connecticut">Fairfield County</a>, <a href="Connecticut">Connecticut</a>, United States. It occupies the northeast end of the town of Monroe, extending northeast to the <a href="Housatonic%20River">Housatonic River</a> (the town border with <a href="Oxford%2C%20Connecticut">Oxford</a>) and southwest to Walnut Street. It is bordered to the southeast by the city of <a href="Shelton%2C%20Connecticut">Shelton</a> and to the northwest by the town of <a href="Newtown%2C%20Connecticut">Newtown</a>.
East Village was first listed as a CDP prior to the <a href="2020%20United%20States%20Census">2020 census</a>.
